string.name: module_desc
string.value: Describe the Job Partner Concurrency paradigm to improve task execution efficiency.

string.name: message
string.value: Sometimes part of the code in a task must be executed in the master thread (e.g., the bridge layer between JavaScript and native code).

string.name: task
string.value: Assume 1000 tasks, each made up of three stages that take 50us each. Stage two must run on the master thread.
